text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump “President Trump said, without evidence, that the coronavirus “is going to go away without a vaccine.” While it’s impossible to predict the future, experts say it’s unlikely that the virus will simply go away. “
STAY HOME!!!! https://t.co/SUiuetOYmy
